snippet.title: PS Vita - Aabs Animals
snippet.description:
Aabs Animals on the PS Vita is an AR type application. I would not go as far to say that this is a game or even a pet simulator. Basically this boils down to a model of a cat. You pay 1000 yen for a model which you can watch. There is almost no interaction but you do get a couple of free trophies for doing nothing. Every minute you unlock a new trophy. A total of five trophies can be unlocked.

Parents and Teachers: https://www.newobworld.com/

Enjoy!
